means: （以言辞或表情）威逼，恫吓( browbeat的过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: They were browbeaten into accepting the offer.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们被威逼接受了提议。

sentence.Network_en: Why was I always suffering, always browbeaten, always accused , for ever condemned?
sentence.Network_cn: 我为什么老受折磨, 老受欺侮, 老挨骂,一辈子也翻不了身 呢 ?

sentence.Network_en: Thereupon, finding Tess unfairly browbeaten, the husbands and lovers tried to make peace by defending her.
sentence.Network_cn: 那些丈夫和情人们, 看到苔丝让人这样威慑势凌,有欠公道, 就想帮助苔丝一下,好使争端平息.

PerfectNetExp.abs: Chinese&nbsp;-&nbsp;English Free... ... 被恨的 = hated 被恫吓的 = browbeaten 被恭维的 = complimented.
a poor , browbeaten little clerk ., 可怜的 , 被吓坏的小职员.

list.abs: refused to be browbeaten and insulted ;, 拒绝被逼讯及被侮辱;
a poor , browbeaten little clerk ., 可怜的 , 被吓坏的小职员.

entry.def: If someone tries to browbeat you, they try to force you to do what they want.

example.ex: ...attempts to deceive, con, or browbeat the voters...
example.tran: 蒙蔽、欺骗或恫吓选民的企图

example.ex: When I backed out of the 100 metres, an older kid tried to browbeat me into it.
example.tran: 我要退出100米比赛的时候，一个年纪大些的孩子试图吓唬我就范。

auth_sentence.content: Children may be browbeaten, but adults resist interference with their pleasures.
auth_sentence.res_content: Children may be browbeaten, but adults resist interference with their pleasures.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Children may be browbeaten, but adults resist interference with their pleasures.

auth_sentence.content: I share that with most of mankind, even if they've been browbeaten into not wishing to admit it.
auth_sentence.res_content: I share that with most of mankind, even if they've been browbeaten into not wishing to admit it.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I share that with most of mankind, even if they've been browbeaten into not wishing to admit it.
